# Contributing to Influence Map Australia

Thank you for helping document the architecture of influence between Australia and Israel.

This project tracks individuals and organisations involved in lobbying, charity networks, military links, education boards, political donations, and honours systems.

## üìù How to Submit a Profile

You can submit a profile in two ways:

### Option 1: GitHub Issues
- Go to the "Issues" tab
- Click "New Issue"
- Choose "New Entity Submission"
- Fill out the form and click "Submit"

### Option 2: Direct CSV Entry (for trusted contributors)
- Open `orgs_and_individuals.csv`
- Add a new row matching the header structure

## üõ°Ô∏è Guidelines

- Only submit **verifiable entries** with at least one credible source
- Be respectful and factual ‚Äî no defamatory or speculative content
- You may use a **pseudonym** if you prefer anonymity
- If you're unsure, submit via Issues and let moderators review

## üîç Where to Find Data

- [ACNC Register](https://www.acnc.gov.au/charity)
- [ATO DGR Search](https://www.abn.business.gov.au/)
- [Lobbyist Register](https://lobbyists.pmc.gov.au/)
- [AEC Transparency Register](https://transparency.aec.gov.au/)
- [Order of Australia Honours](https://honours.pmc.gov.au/)
- [Keren Hayesod Board](https://www.kh-uia.org.il/about-us/governors/)
